document.title: Breakpoint information command
document.paragraph:
The breakpoint information command, located in the debug menu and in the project toolbar (
../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_bkpt_info_color.gif ), displays the list of all set breakpoints in the system (enabled or disabled).
center
../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/debugger/breakpoints_list.png
Note: the * shows that the breakpoint has a 40_conditional_breakpoints.xmlcondition.
